ygData.subject: Noobie Here
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello everyone...I was pleased to stumble across this group in my ramblings.  I have recently begun adventuring on the Morden Rasp server.  Find the land of
ygData.messageBody:
Hello everyone...I was pleased to stumble across this group in my
ramblings. I have recently begun adventuring on the Morden Rasp
server. Find the land of Norrath exciting and challenging. But, I
am at that point with my characters (28 Ranger, 18 Cleric, 18
Enchanter, 12 Shaman) that almost demand grouping in order to get
anywhere (or any of the treasures!)

As you may have gathered I play ALOT. If anyone would be interested
in grouping with me, please let me know. Char names: Kenaf,
Montcurie, Coro, Kitzan)

I have noticed the sudden disappearnce of guilds too. How about
this...why don't we start a guild of our own? I would even be
willing to start a toon on a different server if necessary.

Thanks for the group...hope to hunt with you in the near future.
